data.name: AccountCreatedBody
data.value:
Your LawyerSys account has been created

Full name: {FullName}

Email: {Email}

Username: {UserName}

Temporary password: {Password}

Phone: {Phone}

Job: {Job}

Address: {Address}

Date of birth: {DateOfBirth}

SSN: {SSN}

Please change your password on first login. If you did not request this account, contact support.
